title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Global GenAI trends and learnings at re:Invent (GBL206)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - re:Invent全球生成式AI趋势与经验分享 (GBL206)
abstract: [This session is conducted in Japanese] Generative AI technology is advancing at an astonishingly fast pace globally and many customers are exploring innovation with it. In that time, re:Invent is one of the best way to find out insights and chances to your next innovation. This session provides you preliminary knowledge to make your understanding more deeper to up-coming service launches, exciting customer stories and your chances to the future. We will share you global customer stories, common challenges and key points of recent service launches. Please join this session and be prepared for up-coming re:Invent!
abstract_cn: 生成式AI技術正在全球以驚人的速度發展，許多客戶正在探索如何利用它進行創新。在這個時期，re:Invent是發現洞察和尋找下一個創新機會的最佳方式之一。本次會議將為您提供初步知識，使您能夠更深入地理解即將推出的服務、令人興奮的客戶案例以及您未來的機會。我們將與您分享全球客戶案例、常見挑戰以及最新服務發布的關鍵要點。請參加本次會議，為即將到來的re:Invent做好準備！
